text: The Ambassador of the Soviet Union () is a 1969 Soviet drama movie directed by Georgy Natanson.Раввин Лазар соболезнует в связи с кончиной режиссера Георгия НатансонаПОСОЛ СОВЕТСКОГО СОЮЗА It stars Yuliya Borisova, Anatoly Ktorov, and Gunārs Cilinskis. == Actors == * Yuliya Borisova as Ambassador Yelena Nikolayevna Koltsova * Anatoly Ktorov as the King * Gunārs Cilinskis as Julius Helmer, financier (voiced by Yury Yakovlev) * Voldemar Panso as minister of "neighboring country" * Helmut Vaag as daddy Gunar, fisherman * Ants Eskola as foreign minister of the kingdom (voiced by Yefim Kopelyan) * Yevgeniya Kozyreva as Kristina Sorenson == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Georgy Natanson
title: The Ambassador of the Soviet Union
